name: What is DevOps
description: DevOps combines development and operations practices to improve software delivery. It's a key methodology in cloud engineering.

learning_steps.title: What is DevOps
learning_steps.description: Understand how DevOps combines development and operations practices to improve software delivery and reliability.

learning_steps.title: What is DevOps?
learning_steps.description: Learn about the culture, practices, and tools that make up DevOps.

questions.prompt: What is DevOps and why is it important in modern software development?
What does CI/CD stand for and why is it a key practice in DevOps?

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what DevOps is and why it matters?
Can you quiz me on how DevOps relates to cloud engineering?
Can you ask me what CI/CD stands for at a high level?
